message.content:
A television is an electronic device used for broadcast or streaming of audiovisual content.
It has a rectangular shape with a flat-screen display.
The screen is typically black or dark grey, and the frame may be black, silver, or other muted colors.
It has a remote control which allows users to change channels, adjust volume, and access other features.
Some televisions have built-in speakers or are designed to be connected to external speakers.
It is commonly found in homes, hotels, and other private and public spaces for entertainment and information purposes.
Depending on the model, a television can support various types of inputs such as HDMI, USB, or antenna connections.
